full_summary:
===============

**Diesel Fuel, Automotive Gasoline, and Heating Fuel Oil National Master Standing Offer**
---------

**Notice ID:** PW-__HL-636-81351
**Publication Date:** 2022-08-19
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-09-16T14:00:00
**Amendment Date:** 2022-09-06

**Trade Agreement:**

This procurement is subject to various trade agreements, including the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and the Free Trade Agreements with Peru, Colombia, Panama, Korea, and the United Kingdom.

**Procurement Overview:**

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites suppliers to submit bids for the National Master Standing Offer (NMSO) for diesel fuel, automotive gasoline, and heating fuel oil. The NMSO will be awarded based on the lowest bid.

**Delivery Requirements:**

Delivery locations will be specified by the contracting authority on an as-and-when-requested basis from October 1, 2022 to August 31, 2023, inclusive.

**Eligibility Criteria:**

Suppliers must be capable of delivering the required products in accordance with Canadian General Standards Board (CGSB) standards.

**Contracting Entity:**

The contracting entity is Public Works and Government Services Canada, represented by the contracting officer, Ann Lacelle.

**Contact Information:**

Ann Lacelle, Contracting Officer
Phone: (613) 296-3977
Email: ann.lacelle@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Language of Documents:**

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Tender Documents:**

Additional information may be obtained from the following documents:

1. RFSO - PW-__HL-636-81351 (English) <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/02/e31f9033905657184f8b3c8b24f114eb/ABES.PROD.PW__HL.B636.E81351.EBSU001.PDF>
